name: A Stick Stunt Car Chase - Crazy Doodle Racing Moto GP
name_original: A Stick Stunt Car Chase - Crazy Doodle Racing Moto GP
description:
Stick Stunt Car - A mix of puzzles & crazy flip out action!

Drive for your life & don’t crash & burn. (Although that’s fun too)

> FEATURES:

• Over 40 stunts
• Realtime physics
• Epic crashes
• Perform flips, stunts & wheelies
• Endless gaming

> HOW TO PLAY:

• Touch the > button to accelerate
• Touch the < button to reverse
• Touch the flip button to perform crazy stunts
• Touch the top right of screen to pause game

How far will you get?

Download now FREE.
#StickStuntCar
